testcase.name: verifyLoginWithLockedOutUser

failure.message: Error message mismatch: Expected 'Epic sadface: Sorry, this user has been locked out.' but got 'Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service'. expected [Epic sadface: Sorry, this user has been locked out.] but found [Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service]
